thread.title: CHOETECH Has Released Their New Smart Lighting Sensor Wireless Charger for Galaxy Note 5 and S6 Edge Plus
thread.title_full: CHOETECH Has Released Their New Smart Lighting Sensor Wireless Charger for Galaxy Note 5 and S6 Edge Plus

author: prbuzz.com
title: CHOETECH Has Released Their New Smart Lighting Sensor Wireless Charger for Galaxy Note 5 and S6 Edge Plus
text:
A new charging device has been released on Amazon for the Galaxy Note 5 and s6 Edge Plus. The Smart Lighting Sensor charger will also charge all Qi-Enabled Devices
CHOETECH is pleased to announce their new wireless charging device has now been released on Amazon. The new Smart Lighting Sensor Wireless Charger for Galaxy Note 5 and S6 Edge Plus, which also charges all Qi-Enabled Devices has received five-star reviews on the popular shopping platform since its release.
The new wireless charger comes with a lighting sensor that will change according to the brightness of the light. It provides a fast charging method for mobile devices without the need to plug a cell phone into a USB cable. With the wireless charging method, it allows a simplified method of charging.
CHOETECH who has been a leading charger brand on Amazon for some years has listened to their customers need and developed a charging solution that consumers need. The wireless charger is compact in size and does not require a USB lead when charging a mobile device. It provides the fastest possible wireless charge, allowing mobile devices to be fully charged sooner than other devices on the market.
The current price of the Smart Lighting Sensor Wireless Charger for Galaxy Note 5 and S6 Edge Plus is $19.99, which is the limited discount price. It comes with an 18-month warranty.
Technical information
• Wireless Charging Starts the moment you place down any Qi-enabled device or device equipped with a Qi-compatible cover. No cables or USB interface is required. Input: 5V/2A; Output: 5V/1A
• Ultra Compact: Coffee cup coaster size (3.3 × 3.3 × 0.7in),2.25oz, delivers a modern, premium appearance, making it simple and fashion.
• LED Indicator Lights: with the Smart Lightning Sensor built in, it could automatically dim/turn off the light of wireless charger according to the darkness in the room. without any distraction caused by indicator
• Fast and safety charging.1 amp high quality charging coil delivers fastest possible wireless charging speed
• What You Get: CHOETECH Single-Coil Qi Wireless Charger, Micro USB Charging Cable, User Manual, 18-month hassle-free warranty and friendly customer service
Since the launch of the new wireless charger, it has generated positive reviews with gadget experts and consumers who have bought it. One customer on Amazon, Darren Wilson said:
“Very nice single coil wireless charging pad from CHOETECH. Some features I really like were the size of this unit (3.3 × 3.3 × 0.7in), 2.25oz and how its constructed with stability and safety in mind of your device and surface unit will be placed on.”
Another customer called dstrausser83 said: “This simple, yet amazingly functional device makes my charging woes much easier.”
To learn more about the Smart Lighting Sensor Wireless Charger for Galaxy Note 5 and S6 Edge Plus, please visit http://www.amazon.com/Lighting-Wireless-Charger-Samsung-Qi-Enabled/dp/B013AB620C/ref=sr_1_37?s=wireless&ie=UTF8&qid=1440753235&sr=1-37&keywords=wireless+charger&pebp=1440753178151&perid=16RXQKS4MBW0ET127DSZ
About CHOETECH
CHOETECH specializes in designing and manufacturing USB chargers, USB car chargers, wireless chargers and solar chargers. The company aims to continue making most advanced and high-quality products.
Learn more and buy at http://www.choetech.com
